About Me

Lorem ipsum dolor sit, amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Modi, temporibus.

I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.

Shortly after graduating from Daffodil International University, I joined the IT team at AH&Z Associates Ltd where I work on a wide variety of interesting and meaningful projects.

Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

  • Php(OOP)
  • Laravel
  • MySQL
  • Restful API
  • JavaScript (ES6+)
  • VueJs (Vue reactivity, Vuex, Vue-router)
  • SASS, CSS, Bootstrap & Vuetify
  • Amazon web services(S3, EC2, SNS)
  • Git and Github (Version Control)
  • React basic level

Experience

Full stack developer  @  AH&Z Associates Ltd

Feb 2020 - Present

  • Developing complex CRM using VueJs and Laravel.
  • Creating and designing Restful APIs.
  • Solving problem and modify UI, ensuring responsive user interface.
  • Managing complex relational database.
  • Getting external data through APIs and store in database.
  • Communicating and collaborating with team of engineers, designers and producers on a daily basis.
